customProperties.armorEffects: Your armor provides no AC to physical attacks but is treated as 4 AC higher against spell attacks. In addition you gain resistance to psychic damage.
customProperties.weaponEffects: Weapons ignore AC granted through Armor or Shields.

entries.name: Properties
entries: Forging Conditions: Must be carved under starlight.
Armor Effects: Your armor provides no AC to physical attacks but is treated as 4 AC higher against spell attacks. In addition you gain resistance to psychic damage.
Weapon Effects: Weapons ignore AC granted through Armor or Shields.
